name: #SprintRace
description:
"The 100 metres, or 100-meter dash, is a sprint race in track and field competitions. The shortest common outdoor running distance, it is one of the most popular and prestigious events in the sport of athletics. It has been contested at the Summer Olympics since 1896 for men and since 1928 for women." - straight from Wikipedia

Might potentially end up becoming a @VRUnicorns game if I can convince @Horatiu665 ;-) we made this @Kollafoss #IsolationJam in a few hours. No controllers needed, but you still might be able to injure yourself and your surroundings...as always. Start running (or jump...on the spot) and have fun!

#EveryDayIsJammingDay

@JulieHeyde

Music from Bensound.com
